item.title: Need Help With A Loop!

item.description:
@MsnRocks wrote:

i made this to to check the playersName and to create a loop to disconnected the player for every player that is online: am i correct?

if(playerName.Contains("null")) { for (int i = 0; i < getPlayerCount.length; i++) { disconnected = true; } }
